content: gauge 5 3-double_crochet groups + 10 row = 4 in 10 cm fun granny stripe blanket made with self-striping yarn will be easy to make and gorgeous notes 1 afghan is worked in one piece back and forth in row then a border is worked around the outer edge 2 the 3-double_crochet groups are worked into the sps between sts instead of into the top of sts
